name: df-trs
body: |- wceq(ctrs, cab(s0, wbr(ccom(cin(cv(s0), cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0)))), cin(cv(s0), cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0))))), cssr, cin(cv(s0), cxp(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0)))))))
comment: Define the class of all transitive sets (versus the transitive class defined in ~ df-tr ). It is used only by ~ df-trrels . Note the similarity of the definitions of ~ df-refs , ~ df-syms and ~ df-trs . (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 17-Jul-2021.)
